Item.name: Enable Hungry Europan
Item.description: [RMB + E] Enables the hunger and thirst afflictions for the user, causing them to have to eat and drink regularly. This is completely optional and is NOT required to gain buffs from eating or drinking. Warning: Can't be disabled for your current character once it is enabled.

Item.name: Enable Sleepy Europan
Item.description: [RMB + E] Enables tiredness affliction for the user, causing them to have to sleep regularly. This is completely optional. Warning: Can't be disabled for your current character once it is enabled.

Item.name: Enable Moody Europan
Item.description: [RMB + E] Enables the mood affliction for the user, causing them to have to manage their mood by eating and drinking tasty things, using drugs or relaxing. This is completely optional. Warning: Can't be disabled for your current character once it is enabled.

Item.name: Enable Filthy Europan
Item.description: [RMB + E] Enables the bladder and defecate afflictions for the user, causing them to have to pee and poop depending on what or how much they eat and drink. This is completely optional and is NOT required to gain buffs from eating or drinking. Warning: Can't be disabled for your current character once it is enabled.

Item.name: "The Art of Deep Sea Cooking" by Aunt Doris
